value.string:
query
 resource_uid:list
 from_date
 at_date
 to_date
 omit_simulation
 omit_input
 omit_output
 simulation_state:list
 section_category
 selection_domain
 selection_report
 closed_summary
 where_expression
 from_table_list
 selection_uids:list

SELECT
 IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT stock.uid), 0) AS count,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS quantity,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS total_price
 
 FROM
 <dtml-unless from_table_list>
 catalog,
 </dtml-unless>
 catalog AS child,
 stock,
 catalog AS node
 <dtml-if section_category>
 , catalog AS section_c
 , catalog AS section_bc
 , category AS section_membership
 , catalog AS section
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_table_list>
 <dtml-in from_table_list>
 , <dtml-var sequence-item> AS <dtml-var sequence-key>
 </dtml-in>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)"> </dtml-if>
 
 WHERE
 child.uid = stock.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.node_uid
 <dtml-if where_expression> AND <dtml-var where_expression></dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_simulation>
 AND catalog.portal_type != 'Simulation Movement'
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 AND (stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR stock.mirror_node_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.payment_uid IS NOT NULL
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 AND (stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR stock.mirror_node_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.payment_uid IS NOT NULL
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 stock.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if></dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar section_category type="string">
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = node.uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_uids>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in selection_uids>
 node.uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if></dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>

SELECT
 IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT stock.uid), 0) AS count,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.quantity), 0.00) AS quantity,
 IFNULL(SUM(stock.total_price), 0.00) AS total_price
 
 FROM
 <dtml-unless from_table_list>
 catalog,
 </dtml-unless>
 catalog AS child,
 stock,
 catalog AS node
 <dtml-if section_category>
 , catalog AS section_c
 , catalog AS section_bc
 , category AS section_membership
 , catalog AS section
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 , category
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if from_table_list>
 <dtml-in from_table_list>
 , <dtml-var sequence-item> AS <dtml-var sequence-key>
 </dtml-in>
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_domain>, <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)"> </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>, <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLJoinExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)"> </dtml-if>
 
 WHERE
 child.uid = stock.uid
 AND catalog.uid = stock.node_uid
 <dtml-if where_expression> AND <dtml-var where_expression></dtml-if>
 <dtml-if resource_uid>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in resource_uid>
 stock.resource_uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if>
 </dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 AND node.uid = stock.node_uid
 <dtml-if from_date>
 AND stock.date >= <dtml-sqlvar from_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if at_date>
 AND stock.date <= <dtml-sqlvar at_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if to_date>
 AND stock.date < <dtml-sqlvar to_date type="datetime">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_simulation>
 AND catalog.portal_type != 'Simulation Movement'
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_input>
 AND stock.quantity < 0
 AND (stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR stock.mirror_node_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.payment_uid IS NOT NULL
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if omit_output>
 AND stock.quantity > 0
 AND (stock.node_uid <> stock.mirror_node_uid
 OR stock.section_uid <> stock.mirror_section_uid
 OR stock.mirror_node_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.mirror_section_uid IS NULL
 OR stock.payment_uid IS NOT NULL
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if simulation_state>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in simulation_state>
 stock.simulation_state = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="string">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if></dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if section_category>
 AND section.uid = stock.section_uid
 AND section_c.relative_url = <dtml-sqlvar section_category type="string">
 AND section_membership.category_uid = section_c.uid
 AND section_membership.base_category_uid = section_bc.uid
 AND section_membership.uid = section.uid
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if query>
 AND category.uid = node.uid
 AND <dtml-var query>
 </dtml-if>
 
 <dtml-if selection_domain>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_domain)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_report>
 AND <dtml-var "portal_selections.buildSQLExpressionFromDomainSelection(selection_report)">
 </dtml-if>
 <dtml-if selection_uids>
 AND
 (
 <dtml-in selection_uids>
 node.uid = <dtml-sqlvar sequence-item type="int">
 <dtml-if sequence-end><dtml-else> OR </dtml-if></dtml-in>
 )
 </dtml-if>
